p: From early December 2018 to the end of June 2019, 53 EI outbreaks were reported by the RESPE or diagnostic laboratories ( Table 1). Regretfully, epidemiological information was not always available. Overall, the number of confirmed clinical cases were â‰¥246, from 29 different counties located in all French regions, with the exception of Britany and Corsica ( Figure 5).
